description: T1 Sycamore on rear boundary - Reduce in height and radial spread by no more than 2m and crown raise lower growth to finished height of 4m by reducing end weight only where possible and not removing branches to source.T2 Horse chestnut, adjacent to T1 on rear boundary - Reduce in height and radial spread by no more than 2m and crown raise lower growth to finished height of 4m by reducing end weight only where possible and not removing branches to source.T3 Horse chestnut on rear boundary - Reduce in height and radial spread by no more than 2m and crown raise lower growth to finished height of 4m by reducing end weight only where possible and not removing branches to source. Clear debris from fallen stem in gardenT4 Sycamore on rear right hand side - Reduce in height and radial by no more than 2m and crown raise to 3m without removing major branches to source. Remove major dead wood only.T5 Ash adjacent to T4 - Reduce in height and radial by no more than 2m and crown raise to 3m without removing major branches to source. Remove major dead wood only.SUBJECT TO TPO 2504 (13.11.2012)
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
